# From: http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Gradle/article.html
# Android built artifacts
*.apk
*.ap_
*.dex

# Java build artifacts class files
*.class

# other generated files
bin/
gen/
build/

# local configuration file (for Android sdk path, etc)
local.properties

# OSX files
.DS_Store

# Eclipse project files
.classpath
.project

# Android Studio
*.iml
.idea
.gradle

#NDK
obj/
